title: (x) Fnac rounded corporate face - Neophyte {Ignacio}
content:
Hi Folks,

I’m a brazilian computer science student and a fascinated one for typography. This is my first topic here and I’m really glad to join the community. And I have to warn that my english is not that good.  
So, move on: do you guys (and girls too) know what font is this??

[http://www.fnac.com.br/img/destaque\_lounge.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20091106111413/http:/www.fnac.com.br/img/destaque_lounge.gif "http://www.fnac.com.br/img/destaque\_lounge.gif")

[http://www.fnac.com.br/img/titulo\_exclusivo.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20091106111413/http:/www.fnac.com.br/img/titulo_exclusivo.gif "http://www.fnac.com.br/img/titulo\_exclusivo.gif")

Thanks,  
LAILSON BANDEIRA
author: lailsonbm

comments.content:
This one has me stumped too...

I’ll post a zoomed imaged and maybe one of the experts can you

Mikey ;-)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20091106111413im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/zoom1_6508.gif)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20091106111413im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/zoom2_4513.gif)

Have a look in [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20091106111413/http:/typophile.com/node/28155).  
And welcome to Typophile Lailson.
If you searched for “Fnac” on Typophile you would’ve found it. ;^)

Yves\> I’ve heard that search is going to revolutionize the internet.

Mikey ;-)
